What’s new

Book, music and DVD lists, staff and customer reviews and articles on reading. Never miss a new post: Subscribe to our monthly newsletter, follow us on Twitter and like us on Facebook.

Meet the Author: Peter Lovesey

Peter Lovesey explains how he discovered true crime at the age of 8 after his family's home was hit by a Doodlebug, how his crime-writing career began with winning a competition, and why you should submit stock suggestions to your local library service. Read our Meet the Author interview with Peter Lovesey →

The Merchant of Venice: A Shakespeare Story by Andrew Matthews and Tony Ross

Young library customers Katie and Olivia really enjoyed this retelling of Shakespeare's Venetian play Read Katie and Olivia Mitton's review of The Merchant of Venice: A Shakespeare Storyby Andrew Matthews and Tony Ross. →

Get into the Christmas spirit with our Freegal digital music service

Getting into the spirit of the season, holding a Christmas party, or looking for music to listen to while opening your presents? Look no further than these digital titles you can access for free with your library card Check out the Christmassy music you can access on Freegal. →

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
